weekly picks (Dec 2 week 2023)

Posted on December 11, 2023 in 2023dec,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Dec 2nd week collection

  1. PhysRevX.13.041049 Discovery of a Single-Band Mott Insulator in a van der Waals Flat-Band Compound (PRX)

  2. PhysRevLett.131.246701 Emergent Mechanics of Magnetic Skyrmions Deformed by Defects (skyrmion, PRL)

  3. PhysRevLett.131.243201 Following the Nonthermal Phase Transition in Niobium Dioxide by Time-Resolved Harmonic Spectroscopy (PRL)

  4. PhysRevLett.131.243601 Magnonic Frequency Comb in the Magnomechanical Resonator (PRL)

  5. PhysRevLett.131.240001 Essay: Where Can Quantum Geometry Lead Us? (Torma, PRL)

  6. 208 US Particle Physicists Make Their Wish List (Physics)

  7. 193 Inconsistency Turns Up Again for Cosmological Observations (Physics)

  8. 2312.06277 Edge-State-Mediated RKKY Coupling in Graphene Nanoflakes (RKKY, arXiv)

  9. 2312.05918 Van Hove singularity-induced negative magnetoresistance in Dirac semimetals (negative MR, arXiv)

  10. 2312.05812 Topological conditions for impurity effects in graphene nanosystems (arXiv)

  11. 2312.05535 Chemical potential of magnetic skyrmion quasiparticles in heavy metal/iron bilayers (skyrmion, arXiv)

  12. 2312.07354 Quantum phase transitions in two-dimensional superconductors: a review on recent experimental progress (SIT, arXiv)

  13. 2312.07053 Field-induced superconductivity mediated by odd-parity multipole fluctuation (multipole, arXiv)

  14. 2312.06774 Non-constant geometric curvature for tailored spin-orbit coupling and chirality in superconductor-magnet heterostructures (geometric curvature, arXiv)

  15. 2312.07256 Spontaneous charge current in time-reversal-symmetry breaking phase in kagome metals (kagome, arXiv)

  16. 2312.07081 Giant X-ray circular dichroism in a time-reversal invariant antiferromagnet (SWCheong, arXiv)

  17. 2312.06931 Kondo coherence versus superradiance in THz radiation-driven heavy-fermion systems (Kondo, arXiv)

  18. 2312.07449 Origin of correlated diffuse scattering in the hexagonal manganites (YMnO3, arXiv)

  19. 2312.07341 Unconventional crystal structure of the high-pressure superconductor La$_3$Ni$_2$O$_7$ (nickelate, arXiv)

  20. 2312.07515 Quantum Anomalous Hall and Spin Hall Effects in Magnetic Graphene (arXiv)

  21. 2312.07493 Polarization-induced Weyl phonons in nonsymmorphic crystals (Weyl phonon, arXiv)

  22. 2312.07116 Sliding Dynamics of Current-Driven Skyrmion Crystal and Helix in Chiral Magnets (nagaosa, arXiv)

  23. 2312.07013 Photonic spin Hall effect in Haldane materials (arXiv)

  24. 2312.06407v1 Nanoscale strain manipulation of smectic susceptibility in kagome superconductors (kagome, arXiv)

  25. 2312.06011v1 Superconductivity in correlated carbon nanotubes under pressure: A Bogoliubov-de Gennes study (carbon nanotube, arXiv)

  26. 2312.05378v1 Kink in cuprates: the role of the low-energy density of states (kink, arXiv)

  27. 2312.06511v1 Paradigm for finding d-electron heavy fermions: the case of Cr-doped CsFe$_2$As$_2$ (d heavy fermion, arXiv)

  28. 2312.06300v2 New approach to extract important degrees of freedom in quantum dynamics using singular value decomposition: Application to linear optical spectrum in two-dimensional Mott insulators (arXiv)

  29. 2312.06284v1 Static magnetic order with strong quantum fluctuations in spin-1/2 honeycomb magnet Na2Co2TeO6 (arXiv)

  30. 2312.05343v2 Active Learning approach to simulations of Strongly Correlated Matter with the Ghost Gutzwiller Approximation (arXiv)

  31. 2312.06291 Towards a phase diagram of the topologically frustrated XY chain (arXiv)

  32. 2312.05656 Plasmonic skyrmion quantum thermodynamics (skyrmion, arXiv)

  33. rs-3639312 Stable skyrmion bundles at room temperature and zero magnetic field in a chiral magnet (skyrmion bundle, researchsquare)

  34. 2312.05129v1 Evidence for vertical line nodes in Sr$_2$RuO$_4$ from nonlocal electrodynamics (ruthenate, arXiv)

  35. 2312.05196 Magnetic Order and Magnetic Excitations in FeTe: How Good is a Short-Range Heisenberg Model? (FeTe, arXiv)

  36. 2312.05035 Proximity-induced nonlinear magnetoresistances on topological insulators (nonlinear, arXiv)

  37. 2312.04600 Haldane Bundles: A Dataset for Learning to Predict the Chern Number of Line Bundles on the Torus (arXiv)

  38. PhysRevX.13.041046 Theory of Free Fermions under Random Projective Measurements (PRX)

  39. PhysRevResearch.5.L042036 Exploring new states of matter with a photonic emulator (iridate citing paper, Physical Review Research)
